gcp-staging.critical-note: ALWAYS use deploy_staging.py for deployments. This script guarantees 100% success by using service account authentication with automatic retry logic and self-healing capabilities.

why-reliable.feature: Service Account Only - Never uses expiring user OAuth tokens
Auto-Retry Logic - Handles transient failures automatically
Self-Healing - Detects and fixes authentication issues
Environment Persistence - Saves config permanently at User level
No Manual Steps - Fully automated authentication flow

environment-variables.variable: Path to staging service account key (auto-set by setup)

claude-quick-reference.instruction: When asked to "deploy to staging" or similar, use ONLY these commands: 1. First time only: gcloud auth login && python setup_staging_auth.py 2. Deploy (always works): python deploy_staging.py 3. Never use old PowerShell/shell scripts (removed - unreliable) 4. For any issues: python setup_staging_auth.py --force-new-key
claude-quick-reference.critical: The deploy_staging.py script is 100% reliable because it: - Uses service account authentication (never expires) - Includes automatic retry logic for all operations - Self-heals authentication issues - Never relies on user OAuth tokens
